articles.title: House Democrats push for permanent earned income tax credit expansion - CNBC
articles.description: House Democrats have called for making the expansion of the earned income tax credit permanent, providing a boost to 17 million Americans, policy experts say.

articles.title: US CDC advises against travel to Afghanistan, other countries over COVID-19 - The Indian Express
